main event: A bright, pale-yellow, ball-like object about 40 feet in diameter was observed moving slowly at a very high altitude from west to east, silently disappearing to the east.
interesting points: The object showed no trail, no maneuver, and no change in speed.
The weather conditions were clear and windy at the time of the sighting.
The sighting was reported by J.F. Escobar, a Security Police officer.
Similar sightings of Satellite Echo were reported in the area around the same time period.
